definitions.definition: develop gradually, especially from a simple to a more complex form.
examples: the company has evolved into a major chemical manufacturer
synonyms: metamorphose; humoroustransmogrify "our little tea party evolved into an all-night bash"

definitions.definition: (with reference to an organism or biological feature) develop over successive generations, especially as a result of natural selection.
examples: the populations are cut off from each other and evolve independently

develop, progress, advance; Moremature, grow, expand, spread; alter, change, transform, adapt, metamorphose; humoroustransmogrify "our little tea party evolved into an all-night bash"Moremature, grow, expand, spread; alter, change, transform, adapt, metamorphose; transmogrify our little tea party evolved into an all-night bash
